REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0348 reute w f BC-ENGELHARD-BUILDS-PLAN 03-11 0053

TEXT.TITLE: ENGELHARD BUILDS PLANT IN JAPAN
TEXT.BODY: Engelhard Corp <EC> said its Japanese joint venture Nippon Engelhard Ltd is constructing a new chemical catalyst manufacturing facility at its Numazu complex and expanding its research laboratories at Ichikawa. Start-up is targeted for third quarter 1987. Reuter
